title: Shenzen Spanish-Themed Resort with Lagoon Pool
description: A Spanish-themed hotel in the urban heart of Shenzen's Overseas Chinese Town, the lush and lavish InterContinental Shenzhen, an IHG Hotel is the perfect destination for work, rest or play. Escape on a pirate adventure to the Caribbean Garden, enclosing a massive 2000sqm swimming pool, complete with waterfalls, outdoor play area and sand beach. Enjoy Cantonese cuisine at El Chino Chinese Restaurant and enjoy a restful slumber in one of the gorgeous guest rooms.
offer_address: No. 9009 Shennan Road, Overseas Chinese Town, Shenzhen, 518053, China

title: Shenzhen Hyatt Elegance in the Heart of Futian District with Indoor Pool and Seven Restaurants & Bars
description:
Experience refined five-star luxury in the heart of Shenzhenâ€™s vibrant Futian District. This sophisticated haven is ideally located near cultural gems like the Shenzhen Museum and lush Lianhuashan Park. Savour authentic Cantonese cuisine at Garden Pavilion, indulge in premium steak and seafood fare at The Glasshouse or unwind with a cocktail on the rooftop pool terrace while gazing at the city.

Just steps from high-end shopping and surrounded by serene green spaces, the hotel offers the perfect blend of urban excitement and peace. After a day out, relax at the tranquil spa, work up a sweat in the fitness centre or end the night with a drink or two at The Attic, where glittering skyline views stretch into the early morning.
offer_address: 5023 Yi Tian Road, Futian District, Shenzhen 518033, China
